shortDescription: This update includes a new Concise Office List export and more!
body:
The Network360 Team is excited to bring you this update which includes: 
•	a new Concise Office List export, 
•	updates to the Client Summary page in Usage Analytics, and more!

## Enhancements

#### Concise Office List

Network360 team is excited to add the Concise Office List export option to Create a List, Compare Networks, and Competitive Dashboard modules.

This new export streamlines the results in a .csv file by including only one row per practice location, regardless of the providers or specialty groups.  The information in this .csv export will list each address only once within the export. 

To select this export option, click on the export button on the Provider List (detail results) page accessed through Create a List, Compare Networks or Competitive Dashboard. A dropdown list of export options will appear. 

![Export Options](/cms/cms-assets/media/concise-office-list-export-options.png "Export Options with Concise Office List included")

Then, select the export you desire and click the Export CSV button.  

You’ll notice that when you choose the Concise Office List, you will no longer see options to include the networks, tags, provider comments, and custom attributes as these are not part of a Concise Office List.  If you want to see this information, select the Provider List Details export.  The Provider List Details export is the default selection when you click the Export button.

 

### Disruption Support

#### Add New/Edit User and Manage User pages

Now, there is a new role, Disruption User, to identify individuals who have permission to use the Disruption module.  On the Manage Users page, this role displays as DU in the role column for those with this permission. 

## Fixes

### Accessibility

Now, when an analysis is in progress when a project promotion starts, the analysis will fail and correctly show as failed. 

Fixed an issue which prevented large analyses from successfully finishing.

### Adequacy

Now, when an analysis is in progress when a project promotion starts, the analysis will fail and correctly show as failed. 

Fixed an issue which prevented large analyses from successfully finishing.

### Help Center

Fixed an issue where a page’s short description did not display within the search results. 

### Rate Analytics

Now, when a user without access to Rate Analytics will see marketing information with a message to contact an Account Manager for more details.  This message replaces a broken link to a Zelis Rate Analytics marketing page.  

## Help Center Content Updates

### New

* Create a List Reference Guide in Using Network360 section
* Recruitment Reference Guide in Using Network360 section
* Videos in Get Started Section

  * These cover a variety of topics including navigating within Network360, search criteria, population files, Competitive Dashboard, Compare Networks, and much more!
